BI REPORTING CASE STUDY SUMMARY
1

CASE STUDY – FINANCIAL MODELING AND EQUITY RESEARCH SERVICES
ABOUT THE CLIENT
Client is a leading brokerage firm that provides market access and trade execution services across multiple asset classes
SITUATION
▪
Client has a high market-share and strong technology platforms combined with an experienced team of professionals
▪
Merilytics partnered with the client to provide white-label equity research reports by taking on the end-to-end ownership from stock 
picking stage to delivering a robust high quality final report with a 12-month price target, for publication
▪
Build bottom-up financial models with all revenue and cost drivers projected out for three years, along with multiple valuation 
methodologies
▪
Made projections based on comprehensive understanding of the sector, the company and the macroeconomic factors affecting the 
trends.
▪
Identified the value or growth drivers and generated a clear and robust investment thesis
▪
Drafted the equity research report in a client-specified format with clear structure and customized language style
▪
Ensured turnaround times of about 4-5 weeks for each stock report 
VALUE ADDITION
IMPACT
▪
Quick turnaround times allowed client research team to increase coverage and improve profitability of the Institutional Sales & 
Trading group
▪
Published portfolio generates about 500-800 bps outperformance compared to the benchmark index on a market capitalization 
weighted basis
